Ingredients.9: 1 quart fresh strawberries, hulled and halved horizontally

Ingredients.10: 0.75 cup low-fat frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip® Lite), thawed (Optional)

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper or spray with cooking spray.

Directions.2: Mix flour, sugar, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl; cut in cold butter using a pastry blender or your hands until crumbly.

Directions.3: Stir buttermilk and applesauce together in a separate bowl; pour into the flour mixture until dough comes together and is sticky. Using 2 spoons, drop dough into about 1/2 tablespoon-size mounds onto the prepared baking sheet, making 36 total mounds.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until the bottoms are slightly browned, 4 to 5 minutes. Cool biscuits.

Directions.5: Thread 3 biscuits onto each skewer, alternating with 3 strawberries halves, until all the ingredients are used. Top each skewer with whipped topping.
